verbs.description: I [V: have] been lied to by the best : Robert McNamara , Henry Kissinger , Richard Nixon -- and let me tell you these Trumpys are a bunch of pikers . The thing I learned in my tender days is a liar always tells you the exact opposite of what is real . There was no light at the end of the tunnel , there was treasonous interference in peace talks and Nixon was a crook . Important fact for liars : Keep your story straight . History works slowly . The truth is harsh when it comes out , and with luck you will be dead by the time it arrives . These bumblers have told so many conflicting lies , so extravagantly , so publicly , so repetitiously , that Special Counsel Robert Mueller must just be rolling his eyes at each new frantic invention . I can hardly wait to see what lie tomorrow brings . Katherine Keane , Southeast Portland
